name: wildfire_disclosure_report_provider
title: What company will provide the optional Wildfire Disclosure Report?
label: Report Provider
description: If you don't know, leave it blank for the seller to fill in.
tips: The provider should be experienced in California wildfire risk assessment.
small_print: The provider must be authorized to provide wildfire disclosure reports in California.

wildfire_disclosure_report_provider.name: wildfire_disclosure_report_provider

suggested.hint: This field is optional, so you may leave it empty. However, filling it out could strengthen your offer and expedite its processing.

wildfire_disclosure_report_provider.tooltip: Enter the name of the wildfire report provider
